CustomField.formula:
TEXT( MONTH( Membership_Promotion__r.Start_Date__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( DAY( Membership_Promotion__r.Start_Date__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( year( Membership_Promotion__r.Start_Date__c ) ) & " - " &
TEXT( MONTH( Membership_Promotion__r.End_Date__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( DAY( Membership_Promotion__r.End_Date__c ) ) & "/" & TEXT( year( Membership_Promotion__r.End_Date__c ) )
CustomField.label: Date Range
